website_summaries.verdict: This popular and wallet-friendly silicone cover features a larger font size along with a plethora of designs and colors for the fashion-conscious MacBook owner.
pros: Fits well and doesn't leave a sticky residue on keys
Durable and holds up after being cleaned, which is easy to do with soap and water
Doesn't bubble or warp from the heat generated by the computer
Great for keeping pet hair out of keys
cons: Is somewhat hard to use in the dark with just the backlighting
Those who type fast find that the cover slows them down

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, protects great!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my MacBook Air perfectly. The only drawback is that the characters on the cover are larger than the ones on my keyboard, so at night, when I have the backlight on, it can make it difficult to make out the characters. Fortunately, I am a touch typist, so I don't have to look at the keyboard too often. But still. It's a great cover for keeping out crumbs (Yes, I am one of those people who eat at my desk), as well as hair and stuff...I'm a shedder and my dog sheds. Easy to install, and it actually comes with two covers.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pelkonen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my computer
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bright color and exactly what i was hoping for. Looks great on my computer. Does't have any funny logos or name brands on. Just a plain key board cover. I love that the letters on the cover are so nice and big. They also sent an extra cover for free in the mail which is over and above exchange and more than what you think you are getting. Thank you very much. I will definitely buy from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: You *will* be able to see these!
customer_reviews.text: I had to turn down the backlighting on my laptop to make this work (the smaller letters on the keyboard were shining through, making the large ones on this cover hard to see). Since I don't use the laptop in the dark, this is no problem, and I LOVE the big characters and matching color on my keys now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like how the keyboard turned out
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the keyboard turned out, and the customer service was great. They even included an extra keyboard cover in the order as a gift. Thank you so much! The only thing I have to say is that I thought the keyboard was more of a sticker than a silicon-like, easily removable product, but I really like that it isn't permanent and I can easily slide it off if I need to. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size & color but don't expect it to last for more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: I love the large letters, the color and the smooth feel of this keyboard protector. I use my laptop for multiple hours per day and do not work in an office so this has kept a LOT of dirt and dust out of the keys. I'm glad this cover is made of recyclable material (silicone) but I wish it lasted longer because recycling facilities that accept silicone are not super common around the US. I've had my latest for about two months and it's lost its snugness and the space bar and a few other keys are super faded.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harkes

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Does not promote smooth typing. I guess if you are prone to spilling things on your computer you should use it, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Refresh your keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this keyboard which fits my Mac perfectly. My 5 year old computer had letters that were scraped off some keys, which bothered me. Now I have a "new" computer!
customer_reviews.author: Brookline Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Product is great
customer_reviews.text: Love my keyboard cover! Keeps the junk out of my keys and even makes the letters easier to see. I was worried the colors would make it difficult. The company was very generous and sent an extra cover- I'm using one for my bluetooth keyboard and the other for the laptop keyboard. Thanks DHZ!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: 2 covers
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I misread the description, but I think I received two covers. The blue with large letters and a clear cover. I actually like the clear better. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Love that they send you an extra cover for free ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that they send you an extra cover for free with a purchase! The only thing that I was a little peeved by was that the letters on the cover is extremely large. Yes, it makes the keyboard very easy to see but it also makes me feel like I'm a little kid/have vision problems and need larger letters. Other than that, it's a good cover
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: So neat to find my package included a free transparent cover. Both slip on beautifully to create a snug fit. The enlarged letters make it easy on my eyes. And how cool was it to have lightning fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nievera-Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I got 1 extra clear cover for free. This is a pretty good deal then. If in any case my original cover broke, I have a free replacement. Plus, the cover is good looking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: This did NOT fit my new Mac book pro 13" ...
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT fit my new Mac book pro 13" keys, they didn't match up. I don't have the touch bar but not all the keys were the same shape as the cover so it didn't line up. Have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love It Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new screen cover. Its cute and convenient. It was very easy to install and has held up great so far. I would defiantly recommend this product. It even came with another cover free of charge. I would defiantly order from this company again. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: C. Sorgie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. I've had several of these from other ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I've had several of these from other sellers and they tore in a day or so. I've had this one for several months and it's still in fantastic condition. The letters and numbers haven't worn off or faded and the item has no tears in it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Texsheva

customer_reviews.title: I now have protection!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Will never ruin a computer with spilt liquids again. Fits perfect. They even sent me an extra one and a very sweet grammatically incorrect thank you note that made me smile! Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Joeann Fossland

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard protection
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great keyboard protection for my MacBook Pro. Flexible, easy to apply and remove. Nice large letters. Company included an extra cover, free of charge. Cons: The white lettering on the lighter blue keys is difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: elons

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes typing fun. Keeps keyboard clean. Great price. Lots of colors to choose from
customer_reviews.author: L. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Keep my keyboard protected and love the larger font which makes the keys easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep my keyboard protected and love the larger font which makes the keys easier to see. The gradient colors are cool looking when backlit by my keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Riven

customer_reviews.title: The perfect answer to keeping your laptop protected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my laptop, it looks great and fits perfectly. The shipping was very fast and the packaging well done. I have really worried in the past about taking care of my laptop so it will last ! Now I feel as though it is properly protected. !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Great FIt! Great Feel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I am a teacher and I use my computer way too much! THis helps though!!! SOft touch! easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my cover
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my cover. Didn't realize I would get two covers. Product is high quality and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: MegTX

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Your yellow business card has alot of errors in grammar, spelling, capatilization, and using complete sentences. As a business I would hire an editor to make sure to correct those because it takes away from someone believing in your company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelowder

customer_reviews.title: Color rubs off but nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color started rubbing off on the spacebar immediately, but for the price it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: This cover I gorgeous. However very hard to type on. It's taking a lot to get used to. The film also doesn't not lay perfectly over the keyboard. But will keep my 1 and 3 year old from ruining my Mac!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. She loved it, and it's practical as well. It might give you a few seconds grace period if you had a spill and it will keep dust and crumbs from getting down into the keys.
customer_reviews.author: PeteInRealLife

customer_reviews.title: Got an extra keyboard cover for free
customer_reviews.text: The original ombré one didn't fit my laptop so I gave it away but the second one that I got for free was perfect. It matched my case on my laptop and fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Real review

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and it's not wearing out like the last one I bought was. I don't remember how much I spent on this, but I feel like it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: kailas07

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to see letters and symbols. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: ringrhebell

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice cover that adheres very well to your keyboard, and for a great price. My Mac's trackpad and keyboard had previously had a lot of cumulative water damage from occasional spills, which would have cost $300 in repairs if I did not have a warranty. I bought this cover to prevent that from happening and it's done its job. It's a $6 solution that could save you $300, and it looks good! I also liked the extra cover given.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviewer 550

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits just fine on the keyboard, came with an extra clear cover, which is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M

customer_reviews.title: it is not perfect, but it is the same as I expected
customer_reviews.text: it is not perfect, but it is the same as I expected. also it takes time to get used to the different feeling of typing.
customer_reviews.author: mym

customer_reviews.title: and this product is useless to me
customer_reviews.text: The image of the product is not consistent with the product I received. As pictured, the cover appears to have characters that line up in size/shape/location with the characters on the actual keyboard. In reality, that is not the case. As a result, the backlight feature of the keyboard is not effective in low-light situations, and this product is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for my son's expensive laptop & careless habits of youth
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, looks cool, and a must have for my college aged son who is not careful with his laptop.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design on cover and keyboard cover is great for older people.

customer_reviews.title: The letters are big and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Really PRETY!!!! The letters are big and easy to read. The light kinda shines through, but more through the out lines of the keys. Fits perfect on a 2015 MacBook Air 13".

customer_reviews.title: looks terrible after 2 days... wavy edges don't lay flat and stick up everywhere...  looks awful
customer_reviews.text: when I first put it on I loved it but after a day or 2 the edges started sticking up and just looks terrible now.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes sticky keys, good for keeping clean
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping water away, sticky keys are sometimes not good for typing quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you DHZ for providing us with a great keyboard cover. I chose the blue gradient cover and I love the way it feels. Just like the description says, the numbers and symbols are printed larger in a nice white font. I bought this for my macbook air 13 inch and even the function keys have accurate symbols printed. I love this cover and would buy it again. Definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: it never had really great "stick" to the keys

customer_reviews.title: Good price...Good Fit...Looks Great!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quit fit my keyboard. It's cute, but easier to use my keyboard without it. Didn't return. May give to someone else. It's really cute.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I buy a new cover every year ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I buy a new cover every year since they fade but I am digging this current sky blue one I got this time! 5 Stars!!

customer_reviews.text: Good product, nice price, great service. The additional cover is a great touch. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy

customer_reviews.title: wish they made more of these in different colors - I would buy several

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% fit

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
